data.comment: Today's referee, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Villarreal.
Goal! Real Madrid take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Mariano Diaz.
In the minute 2, That's a fine assist from Dani Carvajal.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid's Mariano Diaz has run offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Villarreal's Moi Gomez is whistled for offside at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 11, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Villarreal.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Villarreal attack but Dani Parejo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
In Villarreal, Alfonso Pedraza of Villarreal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 23, Free kick Villarreal.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Important block from the Real Madrid defence as Manu Trigueros fires in a strike for Villarreal.
In the minute 26, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Villarreal.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 32, Real Madrid's Dani Carvajal gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Real Madrid's Lucas Vazquez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
Real Madrid are whistled for offside.
In the minute 35, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Real Madrid close to the penalty box.
Real Madrid push forward at Estadio de la Ceramica and Martin Odegaard gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Villarreal defence.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
In Villarreal, Real Madrid push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, Free kick Real Madrid.
Real Madrid push upfield but Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez quickly pulls them for offside.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Real Madrid at Estadio de la Ceramica.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 48, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Real Madrid advance rapidly upfield but Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez blows for offside.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 54, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a throw-in for Villarreal, close to Real Madrid's area.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Villarreal.
In the minute 55, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Real Madrid push forward at Estadio de la Ceramica and Martin Odegaard gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Villarreal defence.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Villarreal.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Villarreal are pushing forward but Gerard Moreno's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Throw-in Villarreal.
Samuel Chukwueze is replacing Carlos Bacca for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 61, Unai Emery (Villarreal) is making a second substitution, with Pervis Estupinan replacing Manu Trigueros.
Unai Emery is making the team's third substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Yeremi Pino replacing Alfonso Pedraza.
Samuel Chukwueze for Villarreal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 63, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
At Estadio de la Ceramica, Villarreal are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Eden Hazard with Vinicius Junior. This is the first substitution made today by Zinedine Zidane.
The away team have replaced Martin Odegaard with Isco. This is the second substitution made today by Zinedine Zidane.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nacho (Real Madrid) has received a yellow card from Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
In the minute 69, Vicente Iborra (Villarreal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Villarreal's Dani Parejo misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Real Madrid at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 70, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Villarreal.
Villarreal are coming forward and Raul Albiol gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, In Villarreal, Lucas Vazquez of Real Madrid is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
In the minute 75, An attacking Villarreal player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! The home team is awarded a penalty in Villarreal. Gerard Moreno converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 78, Important block from the Villarreal defence as Luka Modric fires in a strike for Real Madrid.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In the minute 80, Villarreal needs to be cautious. Real Madrid have an attacking throw-in.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 82, Gerard Moreno (Villarreal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Villarreal's Gerard Moreno gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Real Madrid defender.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In the minute 85, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid make their third substitution with Marco Asensio replacing Mariano Diaz.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 88, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez waits before resuming play because Mario Gaspar for Villarreal is still down.
In the minute 89, Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Villarreal's half.
It seems as if Mario Gaspar is unable to continue. Ruben Pena replaces him for the home team.
Unai Emery (Villarreal) is making a fifth substitution, with Takefusa Kubo replacing Moi Gomez.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Villarreal.
In Villarreal, Takefusa Kubo of Villarreal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Alejandro Jose Hernandez Hernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
The match has come to a close in Villarreal. The final score is 1-1.
At Estadio de la Ceramica, Yeremi Pino has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Toni Kroos is booked for the away team.
